Class SPIClassWrapper¶

  • Defined in File SPIClassWrapper.hpp

Class Documentation¶

class SPIClassWrapper¶

The class SPIClassWrapper is used to make the generic SPIClass compatible with Arduino. It wraps the required functions into the Arduino API calls.

Public Types

using BusType = SPIClass¶

Sets the bus type to SPI.

Public Functions

inline explicit SPIClassWrapper()¶

Constructor of the SPIClassWrapperclass with no parameters.

inline explicit SPIClassWrapper(SPIClass &bus)¶

Constructor of the SPIClassWrapperclass with a SPIClass parameter. Can be used to pass a desired SPI instance to the wrapper.

inline ~SPIClassWrapper()¶

Destructor of the SPIClassWrapper.

inline void init(const SPISettings &settings)¶

The SPIClass::init does not include the setting of the data mode, bit order and baudrate, all of which is done in SPIClass::beginTransaction(SPISettings ). But we do not know about such details at this level. Therefore init() is not sufficient to restart a SPIClass object after a reset !

Parameters

settings – [in] Settings for the SPI communication interface.

inline void deinit()¶

The function deinit de-initializes the SPI interface.

inline bool transfer(uint8_t *txBuffer, uint8_t txLen, uint8_t *rxBuffer, uint8_t rxLen, uint8_t readAddress)¶

The function transfer is used to transfer data.

Parameters

  • txBuffer – [in] Transmit buffer.

  • txLen – [in] Length of the data that should be transmitted.

  • rxBuffer – [in] Receive buffer.

  • rxLen – [in] Length of the data that should be received.

  • readAddress – [in] Desired address where the device should read from.

Return values

  • 0 – Error.

  • 1 – Success.

Returns

Function returns a boolean value to indicate if the transfer was successful or not.

inline SPIClass &getBus()¶

The function getBus is used to retrieve a pointer to the wrapper’s bus-object.

Returns

A pointer to the current SPI bus-object of the wrapper.

inline void setBus(SPIClass &spiObj)¶

The function setBus is used to set the SPIClass object of the wrapper.

Parameters

spiObj – [in] Reference to the desired SPIClass object.

Public Static Attributes

static constexpr uint8_t TLX493D_SPI_READ_BIT_ON = 0x80¶
